about_the_game:
Get more out of Train Simulator Classic 2024 with the optional Rail Subscription. The perfect way to get started with the ultimate railway hobby, this includes the base game along with a selection of curated routes and locomotives ready to play.

TRAIN SIMULATOR CLASSIC

The Rail Subscription includes full access to the Train Simulator Classic simulator, with no separate purchase required. This includes the Train Simulator Academy where you can start your career as a virtual train driver or engineer, the Train Simulator Editor where you can create living worlds with comprehensive tools and full Steam Workshop support.

ROUTE ADD-ONS

The routes in the Rail Subscription give you a wide range of rail experiences. Explore scenic countryside landscapes and bustling cities as you run passenger or freight services. Featuring community favourites and developer picks this carefully curated selection provides something for all railfans.
Routes included:

  • Bahnstrecke Riesa – Dresden
  • Clinchfield Railroad: Elkhorn City - St. Paul
  • Doncaster Works
  • East Coast Main Line London-Peterborough
  • Edinburgh – Glasgow
  • Game of Gnomes
  • Hamburg – Hanover
  • Inselbahn: Stralsund – Sassnitz
  • LGV: Marseille – Avignon
  • London to Brighton
  • Miami - West Palm Beach
  • Mittenwaldbahn: Garmisch-Partenkirchen – Innsbruck
  • Norddeutsche-Bahn: Kiel - Lübeck
  • Norfolk Southern Coal District
  • Norfolk Southern N-Line
  • Northeast Corridor: Washington DC - Baltimore
  • North Wales Coast Line: Crewe – Holyhead
  • Portsmouth Direct Line: London Waterloo - Portsmouth
  • Semmeringbahn - Mürzzuschlag to Gloggnitz
  • Soldier Summit
  • Sherman Hill
  • The Rhine Railway: Mannheim - Karlsruhe
  • Weardale & Teesdale Network
  • West Rhine: Cologne - Koblenz

LOCOMOTIVE ADD-ONS

As well as all of the locomotives included within the routes above, the Rail Subscription features additional locomotives. Each of these comes with scenarios for the Rail Subscription routes. Board an array of officially licensed machines from modern day electrics to historic steam legends.
Locomotives included:

  • Amtrak Dash 8-32BWH
  • Amtrak P30CH
  • BR Blue Pack
  • BR Class 73 'Gatwick Express'
  • Class A4 Pacifics
  • Clinchfield Railroad U36C
  • DB BR 86
  • DB BR 146.5 & BR 668.2 ‘Intercity 2’
  • DB BR 204
  • DB BR 411 ICE-T
  • DB BR 605 ICE TD
  • European Loco & Asset Pack
  • EWS & Freightliner Class 08s
  • Flying Scotsman Centenary
  • Freightliner Class 66 v2.0
  • LNER/BR Class A1 ‘Tornado’
  • Metronom ME 146
  • Miami Commuter Rail F40PHL-2
  • MRCE BR 185.5
  • Norfolk Southern Heritage ES44ACs
  • Norfolk Southern Heritage SD70Aces
  • ScotRail Class 68
  • SD70 V2 Volume 2
  • Union Pacific Heritage SD70ACes
  • US Loco & Asset Pack

You can enjoy hundreds of hours of railway adventures with these add-ons in the Rail Subscription. Content included in the subscription will also be regularly updated to ensure you always have something new to play.

Please Note: The Train Simulator interface is localised into English, French, German, Italian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese and Spanish. Localisation on routes and locos varies depending on the individual content.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Rail Subscription

package_groups.description: Includes the base game and selection of curated DLC.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $10.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $10.99 USD.
$29.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 3 month(s) at $29.99 USD.
$54.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 6 month(s) at $54.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy the Train Simulator Classic: Rail Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: $10.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $10.99 USD.
